header: The Way, the Truth, and the Life[a]

verse: Thomas said to him, “Lord, we do not know where you are going. How can we know the way?”
Philip said to him, “Lord, show us the Father, it will be enough for us.”
Judas (not Judas Iscariot) asked him, “Lord, why is it that you are revealing yourself to us and not to the world?”
